name: @ajces/utils
description: general purpose helpers for ajces projects...

scripts.build: npm run bundle && npm run minify && cp utils.js.flow dist/
scripts.minify: uglifyjs dist/utils.js -o dist/utils.js --mangle --compress warnings=false --pure-funcs=Object.defineProperty -p relative --source-map dist/utils.js.map
scripts.release: npm run build && npm test && git commit -am $npm_package_version && git tag $npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags && npm publish

author: Andy Johnson
